short_description: bell steel is a metal fabrication services company based in pensacola, florida, united states.
long_description: bell steel company is an aisc certified steel fabricator which produces high-quality structural and miscellaneous steel, custom metal fabrication, and maintains a raw material service center located in pensacola, florida. serving the continental united states with shipping worldwide, bell steel's mission is to deliver the industry's most reliable steel fabrication services. founded in 1958, bell steel has been a family-owned and operated company for more than six decades. our company's dedicated employees continue to meet the ever-changing needs of the construction industry and provide a superior-quality product, at a competitive price, on schedule. over the past six decades, bell steel has successfully completed thousands of steel fabrication projects, including commercial and industrial steel buildings, warehouses, retail stores, multi-level structures, and many other miscellaneous metal fabrication projects. with 100,000 square feet under our roof, bell steel continues to evolve, adapt and embrace new technology that enables us to better serve our customers.
